00015 CmdTransmissivityModified::CmdTransmissivityModified( TTransmissivity* newTransmissivity, TSceneKit* scene, QUndoCommand* parent )
00016 :QUndoCommand( "Transmissivity changed", parent ),
00017  m_isPreviousTransmissivity( false ),
00018  m_scene( scene )
00019 {
00020     if( newTransmissivity == 0 ) tgf::SevereError( "CmdTransmissivityModified called with NULL TTransmissivity " );
00021     m_pNewTransmissivity = static_cast< TTransmissivity* >( newTransmissivity->copy( true ) );
00022     m_pNewTransmissivity->ref();
00023 
00024     if( m_scene->getPart("transmissivity", false ) )
00025     {
00026         m_isPreviousTransmissivity = true;
00027         m_pPreviousTransmissivity = dynamic_cast< TTransmissivity* >( m_scene->getPart("transmissivity", false ) );
00028         if( m_pPreviousTransmissivity ) m_pPreviousTransmissivity->ref();
00029 
00030     }
00031 }

00045 void CmdTransmissivityModified::undo()
00046 {
00047         if( m_isPreviousTransmissivity )        m_scene->setPart( "transmissivity", m_pPreviousTransmissivity );
00048         else    m_scene->setPart( "transmissivity", 0 );
00049 }

00055 void CmdTransmissivityModified::redo()
00056 {
00057 
00058         m_scene->setPart( "transmissivity", m_pNewTransmissivity );
00059 
00060 }
